name: Adventure Society
description: A global organization that manages monster hunting and exploration tasks. They rank members by their capability.
image_prompt: Emblem or headquarters of Adventure Society, a Guild faction. A global organization that manages monster hunting and exploration tasks. They rank members by their capability. Fantasy setting.

name: Magic Society
description: A collective of magic users dedicated to the research of essences, awakening stones, and magical phenomena. Often rivals with the Adventure Society for influence.
image_prompt: Emblem or headquarters of Magic Society, a Academic faction. A collective of magic users dedicated to the research of essences, awakening stones, and magical phenomena. Often rivals with the Adventure Society for influence. Fantasy setting.

name: Order of the Shield
description: A militant order focused on the protection of the innocent and maintaining peace.
image_prompt: Emblem or headquarters of Order of the Shield, a Military faction. A militant order focused on the protection of the innocent and maintaining peace. Fantasy setting.

name: Mercenary Guild
description: A loose association of soldiers of fortune. While less regulated than the Adventure Society, they handle contracts that others won't touch.
image_prompt: Emblem or headquarters of Mercenary Guild, a Guild faction. A loose association of soldiers of fortune. While less regulated than the Adventure Society, they handle contracts that others won't touch. Fantasy setting.

name: Church of the Healer
description: Dedicated to healing and recovery. They operate hospitals and clinics across Pallimustus.
image_prompt: Emblem or headquarters of Church of the Healer, a Religious faction. Dedicated to healing and recovery. They operate hospitals and clinics across Pallimustus. Fantasy setting.

name: House Remore
description: A powerful noble family known for their strict discipline and high standards.
image_prompt: Emblem or headquarters of House Remore, a Noble faction. A powerful noble family known for their strict discipline and high standards. Fantasy setting.

name: Cult of the Reaper
description: A forbidden organization worshipping death and entropy.
image_prompt: Emblem or headquarters of Cult of the Reaper, a Cult faction. A forbidden organization worshipping death and entropy. Fantasy setting.

name: The Iron Syndicate
description: A clandestine criminal organization that controls the black market and illicit trade.
image_prompt: Emblem or headquarters of The Iron Syndicate, a Criminal faction. A clandestine criminal organization that controls the black market and illicit trade. Fantasy setting.

name: The Verdant Circle
description: A group of druids and rangers dedicated to preserving nature and stopping the encroachment of civilization.
image_prompt: Emblem or headquarters of The Verdant Circle, a Druidic faction. A group of druids and rangers dedicated to preserving nature and stopping the encroachment of civilization. Fantasy setting.

name: The Silent Hand
description: A secretive guild of assassins and spies who sell their services to the highest bidder.
image_prompt: Emblem or headquarters of The Silent Hand, a Assassin faction. A secretive guild of assassins and spies who sell their services to the highest bidder. Fantasy setting.

name: The Council of Six
description: The governing body of Greenstone City, composed of representatives from major guilds and the common folk.
image_prompt: Emblem of The Council of Six, a Political faction. Six distinct symbols arranged in a circle. Fantasy setting.

name: Merchant's Coalition
description: An alliance of wealthy trading families controlling the economy.
image_prompt: Emblem of Merchant's Coalition, a Merchant faction. Scales of commerce balanced with mana crystals. Fantasy setting.

name: Spire Authority
description: The ruling body of Orizon, responsible for maintaining the city's wards and managing the Ascension schedule. They prioritize stability above all else.
image_prompt: Emblem of the Spire Authority, a Political faction. Geometric shapes, white marble, rigid structure. Fantasy setting.

name: System Auditors
description: Bureaucrats tasked with investigating magical anomalies and enforcing the laws of physics. They view magic as a hazardous utility.
image_prompt: Emblem of the System Auditors. A stylized eye or scale, minimalist, clean lines, metallic. Fantasy setting.

name: Clan Hawksley
description: An ancient noble family of monster hunters who view beast slaying as a sacred art. They value precision and honor over brute force.
image_prompt: Emblem of Clan Hawksley. A stylized hawk holding a spear in its talons, green and silver colors. Fantasy setting.
